resetpassword-introparagraph: We are ready for your new password. Please fill it in so you can part-up again!
resetpassword-form-password-placeholder: Use at least 8 characters, 1 number and 1 capital
resetpassword-form-password-tooltip: You know that hackers get smarter every day. Pick a password that is not too easy to guess. Use at least 8 characters, 1 number en 1 capital.
